languages.text: {n}Усиленный воксами, заунывный голос Инскрибии Вультур скрипит на весь зал:{/n} "Слушается дело ДП-1453/2, Скорбящий Сонм против астропатического хора Даргонуса. Представители сторон, предъявите ваши доводы в регламентированном порядке".

traits.locale_text: {n}Усиленный воксами, заунывный голос Инскрибии Вультур скрипит на весь зал:{/n} "Слушается дело ДП-1453/2, Скорбящий Сонм против астропатического хора Даргонуса. Представители сторон, предъявите ваши доводы в регламентированном порядке".
traits.speaker: VC_Prefect

languages.text: {n}Inscribia Vultur's dreary, vox-amplified voice carries across the hall.{/n} "The court will now hear Case DP-1453/2, the Doleful Host against the Astropathic Choir of Dargonus. Representatives for the parties will present their arguments following standard procedure."
languages.original_text: {n}Усиленный воксами, заунывный голос Инскрибии Вультур скрипит на весь зал:{/n} "Слушается дело ДП-1453/2, Скорбящий Сонм против астропатического хора Даргонуса. Представители сторон, предъявите ваши доводы в регламентированном порядке".

traits.locale_text: {n}Insribia Vultur's vox-amplified, dreary voice carries across the hall.{/n} "The court will now hear Case POJ-1453/2, the Doleful Host vs. the Dargonus Astropathic Choir. Representatives for the plaintiff and the defendant will present their arguments following standard procedure."

{n}Insribia Vultur's vox-amplified, dreary voice carries across the hall.{/n} "The court will now hear Case POJ-1453/2, the Doleful Host vs. the Dargonus Astropathic Choir. Representatives for the plaintiff and the defendant will present their arguments following standard procedure."

{n}Inscribia Vultur's dreary, vox-amplified voice carries across the hall.{/n} "The court will now hear Case POJ-1453/2, The Doleful Host vs the Dargonus Astropathic Choir. Representatives for the plaintiff and for the defendant will present their arguments following standard procedure."

{n}Inscribia Vultur's dreary, vox-amplified voice carries across the hall.{/n} "The court will now hear Case POJ-1453/2, The Doleful Host vs the Dargonus Astropathic Choir. Representatives for the plaintiff and for the defendant will present their arguments following standard procedure."

{n}Inscribia Vultur's dreary, vox-amplified voice carries across the hall.{/n} "The court will now hear Case DP-1453/2, the Doleful Host against the Astropathic Choir of Dargonus. Representatives for the parties will present their arguments following standard procedure."

{n}Inscribia Vultur's dreary, vox-amplified voice carries across the hall.{/n} "The court will now hear Case DP-1453/2, the Doleful Host against the Astropathic Choir of Dargonus. Representatives for the parties will present their arguments following standard procedure."

languages.text: {n}Inscribia Vulturs voxverstärkte Stimme hallt durch den Saal.{/n} "Das Gericht befasst sich nun mit Fall DP-1453/2, der Traurige Gastgeber gegen den astropathischen Chor von Dargonus. Vertreter beider Parteien werden gemäß dem Standardprozedere ihre Argumente darlegen."
languages.original_text: {n}Inscribia Vultur's dreary, vox-amplified voice carries across the hall.{/n} "The court will now hear Case DP-1453/2, the Doleful Host against the Astropathic Choir of Dargonus. Representatives for the parties will present their arguments following standard procedure."

traits.locale_text: {n}Inscribia Vulturs voxverstärkte Stimme hallt durch den Saal.{/n} "Das Gericht befasst sich nun mit Fall DP-1453/2, der Traurige Gastgeber gegen den astropathischen Chor von Dargonus. Vertreter beider Parteien werden gemäß dem Standardprozedere ihre Argumente darlegen."

languages.text: {n}La voix morne de Vultur, amplifiée par son vox, résonne dans la salle d'audience.{/n} « La cour va maintenant traiter l'affaire DP-1453/2, le Concile des Affligés contre le chœur astropathique de Dargonus. Les représentants des deux parties exposeront leurs arguments en suivant la procédure habituelle. »
languages.original_text: {n}Inscribia Vultur's dreary, vox-amplified voice carries across the hall.{/n} "The court will now hear Case DP-1453/2, the Doleful Host against the Astropathic Choir of Dargonus. Representatives for the parties will present their arguments following standard procedure."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix morne de Vultur, amplifiée par son vox, résonne dans la salle d'audience.{/n} « La cour va maintenant traiter l'affaire DP-1453/2, le Concile des Affligés contre le chœur astropathique de Dargonus. Les représentants des deux parties exposeront leurs arguments en suivant la procédure habituelle. »

languages.text: {n}缮师·沃尔图尔沉闷的声音被音阵装置放大，回荡在大厅之中。{/n}“本法庭即将审理DP-1453/2号案件，解决阴沉之主与达戈努斯星语唱诗班之间的纠纷。双方代表将按照标准程序陈述各自的主张。”
languages.original_text: {n}Inscribia Vultur's dreary, vox-amplified voice carries across the hall.{/n} "The court will now hear Case DP-1453/2, the Doleful Host against the Astropathic Choir of Dargonus. Representatives for the parties will present their arguments following standard procedure."

traits.locale_text: {n}缮师·沃尔图尔沉闷的声音被音阵装置放大，回荡在大厅之中。{/n}“本法庭即将审理DP-1453/2号案件，解决阴沉之主与达戈努斯星语唱诗班之间的纠纷。双方代表将按照标准程序陈述各自的主张。”

languages.text: {n}La tediosa voz de Inscribia Vultur, amplificada por el voco, llena la sala.{/n} «El tribunal escuchará ahora el caso DP-1453/2, la Hueste Dolosa contra el Coro de Astrópatas de Dargonus. Los representantes de ambas partes presentarán sus argumentos conforme el procedimiento estándar».
languages.original_text: {n}Inscribia Vultur's dreary, vox-amplified voice carries across the hall.{/n} "The court will now hear Case DP-1453/2, the Doleful Host against the Astropathic Choir of Dargonus. Representatives for the parties will present their arguments following standard procedure."

traits.locale_text: {n}La tediosa voz de Inscribia Vultur, amplificada por el voco, llena la sala.{/n} «El tribunal escuchará ahora el caso DP-1453/2, la Hueste Dolosa contra el Coro de Astrópatas de Dargonus. Los representantes de ambas partes presentarán sus argumentos conforme el procedimiento estándar».

languages.text: {n}インスクリビア・ヴァルターの陰鬱な声が、ヴォクスによって増幅されてホールに響き渡った。{/n}「これよりDP-1453/2事件、ダルゴナスの感応通信聖歌隊に対するドールフル・ホストの訴訟を審理する。各当事者の代表が通常の手続きに従って弁論を行う」
languages.original_text: {n}Inscribia Vultur's dreary, vox-amplified voice carries across the hall.{/n} "The court will now hear Case DP-1453/2, the Doleful Host against the Astropathic Choir of Dargonus. Representatives for the parties will present their arguments following standard procedure."

traits.locale_text: {n}インスクリビア・ヴァルターの陰鬱な声が、ヴォクスによって増幅されてホールに響き渡った。{/n}「これよりDP-1453/2事件、ダルゴナスの感応通信聖歌隊に対するドールフル・ホストの訴訟を審理する。各当事者の代表が通常の手続きに従って弁論を行う」

languages.text: {n}İnscribia Vultur'un kasvetli, voks yükselteciyle güçlendirilmiş sesi tüm salonu dolduruyor.{/n} "Mahkeme şimdi Konakçı'nın, Dargonus Astropatik Korosu'na karşı açtığı DP-1453/2 sayılı davayı görecektir. Tarafların vekilleri, iddialarını usule uygun olarak sunacaktır."
languages.original_text: {n}Inscribia Vultur's dreary, vox-amplified voice carries across the hall.{/n} "The court will now hear Case DP-1453/2, the Doleful Host against the Astropathic Choir of Dargonus. Representatives for the parties will present their arguments following standard procedure."

traits.locale_text: {n}İnscribia Vultur'un kasvetli, voks yükselteciyle güçlendirilmiş sesi tüm salonu dolduruyor.{/n} "Mahkeme şimdi Konakçı'nın, Dargonus Astropatik Korosu'na karşı açtığı DP-1453/2 sayılı davayı görecektir. Tarafların vekilleri, iddialarını usule uygun olarak sunacaktır."
